channel.title: budget on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in budget on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Mixed signals: Observations on the 2021-22 Budget
item.description: Budget 2021-22 is a mixed bag. Though it contains praiseworthy allocations towards programs such as Digital India and the USOF and provides a stimulus to R&D, allocations towards the PMGDISHA remain low, while concerns remain that signficant capital expenditure may not take place.

item.title: Four ways how the 2020 budget can promote the digital economy and rights
item.description: We have made 4 recommendations to the Ministry of Finance for the Union Budget 2020-21.
